pathParameters.name: subscriptionId
pathParameters.description: Subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

pathParameters.name: resourceGroupName
pathParameters.description: The name of the resource group.

pathParameters.name: accountName
pathParameters.description: The name of the NetApp account

pathParameters.name: poolName
pathParameters.description: The name of the capacity pool

pathParameters.name: volumeName
pathParameters.description: The name of the volume

queryParameters.name: api-version
queryParameters.description: Version of the API to be used with the client request.
